name: Algor Education
description: Algor Education transforms any content into AI-powered visual and interactive study tools for students, educators, and professionals.
longDescription: Algor Education is an AI-powered web platform designed to enhance learning by converting various content types into structured, visual study tools like mind maps, flashcards, and quizzes. Its mission is to make studying and teaching more efficient, engaging, and personalized for students, educators, and lifelong learners. Unlike traditional AI tools that produce static content, Algor acts as an intelligent study companion, organizing complex information into dynamic formats to improve comprehension and retention. The platform supports a wide range of inputs, including text, PDFs, images, audio, and YouTube videos, making it versatile for diverse educational needs. By offering customizable templates, Algor enables users to tailor learning resources to their specific goals, whether preparing for exams or creating teaching materials. It is trusted by millions worldwide for its ability to streamline the learning process across subjects and educational levels.
features: AI-generated mind maps visually organize complex topics from uploaded content, enhancing understanding and retention.
Flashcards are automatically created from study materials, enabling quick and effective memorization.
Customizable templates allow users to create tailored study guides for specific subjects or learning objectives.
Interactive quizzes generated from user content help test knowledge and reinforce learning.
Summaries condense lengthy texts into concise, structured notes for quick review.
Supports multiple input formats, including text, PDFs, images, audio, and YouTube videos, for versatile content processing.
Real-time collaboration enables users to edit and share mind maps with peers or educators.
Text-to-speech functionality reads content aloud, aiding accessibility and auditory learning.
Export options allow users to save or print study materials in PDF format for offline use.
AI-driven concept extraction highlights key ideas and relationships to deepen topic comprehension.

faqs.question: What types of content can I upload to Algor Education?
faqs.answer: You can upload plain text, PDFs, DOC files, photos, audio recordings, and YouTube videos, which Algor transforms into study tools.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available for Algor Education?
faqs.answer: Yes, Algor offers a free plan with access to core features, limited to 15,000 characters and 30 AI credits for generating study tools.

faqs.question: What are AI credits and how are they used?
faqs.answer: AI credits are used to generate study tools like maps and quizzes, with the number required depending on content length and complexity.

faqs.question: Can I customize the study tools generated by Algor?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can edit and personalize mind maps, flashcards, and other tools to suit their learning or teaching style.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from using Algor Education?
faqs.answer: Students, educators, tutors, content creators, and lifelong learners across all subjects and educational levels can benefit from Algor.

faqs.question: Can I share my study materials with others?
faqs.answer: Yes, Algor allows users to share and export study resources like mind maps and summaries in formats such as PDF.

faqs.question: Does Algor Education support collaborative work?
faqs.answer: Yes, the platform supports real-time collaboration, allowing users to work together on mind maps and other study tools.

faqs.question: Are there subscription plans for advanced features?
faqs.answer: Yes, paid plans offer more AI credits, unlimited uploads, and access to premium templates; details are available on the pricing page.
